meanings.definition: The combined action of a group of people working together to achieve a common goal.
meanings.sent1: In the classroom, the students' teamworks on the project impressed the teacher.
meanings.sent2: Successful teamworks in sports require coordination and communication.
meanings.sent3: The teamworks of the ants carrying food back to their nest was like a well-choreographed dance.
meanings.sent4: The teamworks of the orchestra created a harmonious symphony of sound.
meanings.sent5: The teamworks of the firefighters saved the building from burning down.

meanings.definition: The ability of a group to work together effectively and efficiently.
meanings.sent1: The teamworks of the volunteers ensured the event ran smoothly.
meanings.sent2: Good teamworks in a company lead to increased productivity.
meanings.sent3: The teamworks of the penguins sliding on the ice was both cute and efficient.
meanings.sent4: The teamworks of the gears in a clock make sure it keeps perfect time.
meanings.sent5: The teamworks of the bees in the hive is a marvel of nature's efficiency.
